tasks.name: write_file
tasks.run:
echo "${file_contents}" > /tmp/run/foo.txt
echo "Sleeping for a bit..."
sleep 10

env.file_contents: These are the contents of my file

tasks.name: print_file
tasks.run:
echo "----  WRITING FILE   ----"
cat /tmp/run/foo.txt
echo "----  SLEEPING FOR A BIT  ----"

check.run:
echo "Writing data to display"
echo '[{"kind":"value","name":"Exit Reason","data":"Testing errored check"}]' > /tmp/run/.display
echo "Bailing with invalid status"
exit 1

tasks.name: print_always
tasks.run: echo "This should always run regardless of print_file status"
